| HistoryText             = The Utopians were a group of mutants that started inhabiting [[Utopia (X-Men Base)|Utopia]], the abandoned and former base of the X-Men. They fought off any attempt from anybody at entering the island.{{r|All-New X-Men #40}}

The [[X-Men (New Charles Xavier School) (Earth-616)|X-Men]] were reached out by [[Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement and Logistics Division (Earth-616)|S.H.I.E.L.D.]] to investigate the island after a recon team went missing. The X-Men teleported to the island, and initially engaged the Utopias. After talking it out and discovering the Utopians wanted nothing but to be safe and undisturbed, the X-Men offered them a place at the [[Weapon X Facility|New Charles Xavier School]], which they gladly accepted.{{r|All-New X-Men #41}}
